result.eng: I met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.
result.ga: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maith
result.orig: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maith
result.html: Bhuail mé leis an Taoiseach agus bhuail mé leis an Uachtarán chomh maithI met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail mé leis an Taoiseaċ agus ḃuail mé leis an Uaċtarán ċoṁ maiṫI met the Prime Minister, and I met the President as well.

result.eng: It is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
result.ga: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botún
result.orig: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botún
result.html: Is amhlaidh go ndearna an Taoiseach roinnt botúnIt is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.
result.ponchtml: Is aṁlaiḋ go ndearna an Taoiseaċ roinnt botúnIt is the case that the Prime Minister has made some mistakes.

result.eng: It is time to appoint a new minister.
result.ga: Tá sé in am aire nua a cheapadh
result.orig: Tá sé in am aire nua a cheapadh
result.html: Tá sé in am aire nua a cheapadhIt is time to appoint a new minister.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé in am aire nua a ċeapaḋIt is time to appoint a new minister.

result.eng: After they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
result.ga: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leo
result.orig: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leo
result.html: Tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an Príomh-Aire leoAfter they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis dóiḃ filleaḋ aḃaile ḃuail an Príoṁ-Aire leoAfter they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.

result.eng: The Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ga: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as
result.orig: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as
result.html: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an Príoṁ-Aire le fios do na meáin go raiḃ sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
